basic.blooming: Flowering period April, fruiting period October
basic.color: Flower color light red, light yellow, green, purple, leaf color green

maintenance.soil: Fertile calcareous soil or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, slightly resistant to shade, grows in sunny places
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead, rotten, diseased leaves and the parts that may affect the good appearance
